CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 10, 1954, pg. 11, reads: "THE EMANONES CELEBRATE - The Emanones celebrated their graduation from Baxter Junior High School with a semi-formal at the Fort Pitt Hotel, June 23. Pictured are members (first row) Beverly Scott, treasurer; Arnetta Monroe, secretary; Elizabeth Johnson, president; John Haines, Minnie Pipkin, social chairman; Paquita Sharp, vice president; and Lillian Sellers.  Second row: Sandra Givner and Aylce Perrin.  Third row: Diane DeHall, Gloria Sweeney, Carol Haines and Joyce Davis.  Fourth row: Phyllis Brundidge, Marian Lytch, Carolyn Taylor, Geraldine Totes, Thomas Pitts, Mary Stephens, Bernice Troy, Horace Hord, Mary Ayers, Kerry Thompson and Carolyn Berry.  - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of young women and men of Emanones Club including Beverly Scott, Arnetta Monroe, Elizabeth Johnson, John Haines, Minnie Pipkin, Paquita Sharp, Lillian Sellers, Sandra Givner, Aylce Perrin, Diane DeHall, Gloria Sweeney, Carol Haines, Joyce Davis, Phyllis Brundidge, Marian Lytch, Carolyn Taylor, Geraldine Totes, Thomas Pitts, Mary Stephens, Bernice Troy, Horace Hord, Mary Ayers, Kerry Thompson, and Carolyn Berry, posed in Fort Pitt Hotel for Baxter Junior High School prom
